weekly_top_story.headline: CDC Reduces US Childhood Immunization Schedule From 17 to 11 Diseases
weekly_top_story.summary: The CDC has significantly reduced the recommended childhood immunization schedule from 17 to 11 diseases, raising concerns among experts about potential surges in preventable diseases like hepatitis A and B, which could reverse decades of public health progress.

stories.headline: House of Representatives passes clean extension of ACA tax credits
stories.summary: The House passed a clean, three-year extension of enhanced premium tax credits for ACA Marketplace coverage, averting immediate coverage losses for millions but leaving long-term uncertainty amid ongoing policy debates.

stories.headline: AHA urges MedPAC to recommend higher payment updates ahead of January meeting
stories.summary: The AHA urged MedPAC to recommend higher Medicare payment updates for inpatient, outpatient, and physician services during its January 15-16 meeting to address provider financial stability and access issues.
